email_body: -----Original Message----- From: "Sumey, Katrina" <KSumey@ftenergy.com>@ENRON Sent: Wednesday, June 20, 2001 2:01 PM To: List - NEWGen Support Subject: NEWGen June Release This is the notice that the June 2001 release of NEWGen is available on the web site www.rdionline.com. You are receiving this e-mail because you have been given access to NEWGen through this web site. If you do not want to receive this email, please send a note saying unsubscribe me to newgen@ftenergy.com. NEWGen Staff
